= Class *jplex.components.frame.Dialog*  _extends [APIPangolincomponentsFrame jplex.components.Frame]_  =

== Description ==
A preconfigured dialog box frame class

== Config Table ==
|| *Name* || *Default Value* || *Description* ||
|| _otherButtons_ || `[]` ||  Array of optional button, each item of the array is an object like the following<br /><pre>{<br />&nbsp;&nbsp;label: "Label of the button",<br />&nbsp;&nbsp;click: function: { Function triggered on click }<br />}</pre><br />Note that in the 'click' function, 'this' will refer to the Window.Dialog object. ||
